title: Prepaid cards and gifting Rp
body:
In short I bought a prepaid card worth $25 of Rp and wanted to gift it to one of my friends but when the payment option comes up after including a message there is no option under prepaid cards of $25. The only options are $5, $10, $20, $35, $50 and $100. I've redeemed $25 of Rp for myself before through the prepaid cards but I don't understand why I can't purchase it for a friend. 

Hope anyone can give me some advice/help
Thank you
~Rexisea

replies.body:
Hey dude, 

From what I can tell, there is no way to gift prepaid RP cards through the client.

As it is a prepaid card all you have to do is give the person you're gifting it to the code for the prepaid card, they can then redeem this code in their client.
